item.description:
THIS EVENT HAS BEEN POSTPONED UNTIL TOMORROW (SAT. 7/9/11)  SAME TIME

If  you cannot attend, please update your RSVP or call my cell.  Thanks!

Let's give this event another try. For those who attended last year, we had a great time until the downpours began! Since the music begins at 7:30pm, try to arrive early for dinner/potluck on the beach. I will try to set up same place as last year - in front of the deck on the North Beach clubhouse. Close to the water, depending on the tide conditions. Look for us between lifeguard chairs 5 & 6. Have a red and white beach ball, also orange pool floats on chairs.
item.how_to_find_us: In front of music stage, near water, cell and more info supplied later

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: RI Philharmonic at Narragansett Town Beach
